```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            overflow-x: hidden;
            background-color:#e6eaed;
        }

        .hero-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .hero-image {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .image-wrapper {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1920px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            aspect-ratio: 16/9;
        }
        
        .hotspot {
            position: absolute;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border-radius: 8px;
            z-index: 10;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .hotspot:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        
        .hotspot::before {
            content: attr(data-label);
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            border-radius: 10px;
            background: #e6eaedf2;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: black;
            font-size: 20px;
            font-weight: bold;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 5;
        }
        
        .hotspot:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        /* Button positions */
        .button-about {
            top: 4%;
            left: 52.75%;
            width: 12%;
            height: 35.5%;
        }

        .button-blog {
            top: 42%;
            left: 53.5%;
            width: 9.25%;
            height: 25%;
        }

        .button-work {
            top: 2.5%; 
            left: 39%;
            width: 13%;
            height: 20.75%;
        }

        .button-talks {
            top: 2.7%; 
            left: 66.5%;
            width: 12%;
            height: 15%;
        }

        .button-toast {
            top: 39%; 
            left: 65%;
            width: 13.5%;
            height: 16%;
        }

        .button-books {
            top: 20%; 
            left: 68%;
            width: 11%;
            height: 14%;
        }

        .cat-clickable {
            position: absolute;
            top: 69%;
            left: 50%;
            width: 8%;
            height: 10%;
            cursor: pointer;
            z-index: 10;
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        /* Tooltip for cat only */
        .cat-clickable::after {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 100%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-10px);
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            color: white;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            font-size: 14px;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 20;
        }
        
        .cat-clickable:hover::after {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-5px);
        }
        
    .meow-bubble {
        position: fixed;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff5f7 0%, #ffe6ea 100%);
        border: 3px solid #a3708aff;
        border-radius: 5px;
        padding: 12px 28px;
        font-size: 14px;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: #a3708aff;
        text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
        z-index: 1000;
        animation: meowPop 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55);
        pointer-events: none;
    }

    .meow-bubble::after {
        content: 'â™¡';
        position: absolute;
        right: 8px;
        top: -8px;
        font-size: 16px;
        animation: heartFloat 1s ease-in-out infinite;
    }

    @keyframes meowPop {
        0% {
            transform: scale(0) rotate(-5deg);
            opacity: 0;
        }
        50% {
            transform: scale(1.15) rotate(2deg);
        }
        70% {
            transform: scale(0.95) rotate(-1deg);
        }
        100% {
            transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg);
            opacity: 1;
        }
    }

    @keyframes heartFloat {
        0%, 100% {
            transform: translateY(0px);
        }
        50% {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
        }
    }
        @keyframes meowPop {
            0% {
                transform: scale(0);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            50% {
                transform: scale(1.1);
            }
            100% {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .hotspot::before {
                font-size: 14px;
            }
            
            .cat-clickable::after {
                font-size: 12px;
                padding: 6px 10px;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="hero-container">
        <div class="image-wrapper">
            <img src="images/front_page/bkgd.png" alt="Isabel's Portfolio Hero" class="hero-image" id="heroImage">
            
            <!-- Clickable Navigation Hotspots -->
            <a href="work.html" class="hotspot button-work" data-label="Work"></a>
            <a href="about.html" class="hotspot button-about" data-label="About"></a>
            <a href="talks.html" class="hotspot button-talks" data-label="Talks"></a>
            <a href="blog.html" class="hotspot button-blog" data-label="Blog"></a>
            <a href="books.html" class="hotspot button-books" data-label="Books"></a>
            <a href="toast.html" class="hotspot button-toast" data-label="Pets"></a>
            
            <!-- Cat clickable area -->
            <div class="cat-clickable" onclick="showMeow(event)"></div>

        </div>
    </div>
    
    <script>
        // Load the uploaded image
        async function loadImage() {
            try {
                const response = await window.fs.readFile('tmp/uploads/image.png');
                const blob = new Blob([response], { type: 'image/png' });
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                document.getElementById('heroImage').src = url;
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error loading image:', error);
            }
        }
        loadImage();
        
        // Cat meow function
        function showMeow(event) {
            // Remove any existing meow bubble
            const existingBubble = document.querySelector('.meow-bubble');
            if (existingBubble) {
                existingBubble.remove();
            }
            
            // Create meow bubble
            const bubble = document.createElement('div');
            bubble.className = 'meow-bubble';
            bubble.textContent = 'meow';
            
            // Position near the cat
            const rect = event.target.getBoundingClientRect();
            bubble.style.left = rect.right + 30 + 'px';
            bubble.style.top = rect.top - 60 + 'px';
            
            document.body.appendChild(bubble);
            
            // Remove after 2 seconds
            setTimeout(() => {
                bubble.remove();
            }, 2000);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```
